extendedInfo.description: Master Soundboard is a modular Soundboard Application that allows you to easily discover new Soundboards and download them directly from the Play store.The Master Soundboard will keep track of all your Soundboards and you will no longer need to have a bunch of shortcuts in your App drawer, instead there is only one, to the Master Soundboard. This is probably the Best Soundboard App on the market!The Free version does contain Ads, it also uses Tokens(virtual currency), you can get more Tokens for FREE in the Store, this App NEVER charges you any money! If you have any questions don't hesitate to e-mail us or read the FAQ at our website, http://gnejs.org/This App is an excellent way to get new free ringtones, notifications or alarms!If you are interested in listening to some awesome sound bites then you gotta get this App.Meta Features:Supports the creation of home screen widgets to instantly play any of your favorite Soundboard sounds. Never again will you have to load and wait to play that sound, very practical when the moment might pass if it takes too long! This is similar to the Instant Buttons App.Dynamic Favorites Soundboard, you can choose any number of Sounds from any number of Soundboards as favorite, all these Sounds will be present in your own "Favorites Soundboard" for easy access!Manager Features:Easy to overview all installed and downloadable soundboards from one place and launch them whenever you feel like it.Code decoupled from Sounds, any updates the manager or launcher does not require you do re-download any of the sound packs, saving time and space.All soundboard packs will install to your SDCard and allows you to save that precious internal memory.Option to create shortcuts for your favorite soundboards. (Requires plugin)Soundboard Features:Set Sound as Ringtone/Notification/Alarm, requires SD card.Sound Queueing(Playlist)Infinite Sound LoopingUI CustomizationUses Permissions:WRITE_SETTINGS - Needed to set sounds as ringtone/notification/alarm.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE - Needed to save the sounds to the SD card.READ_PHONE_STATE, ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE and INTERNET - Used by Ads.Tested on:HTC Wildfire (Cyanogen 7)HTC Hero (Android 2.1)Samsung Nexus S (Android 2.3.6)Asus TF101 (Android 4.0.3)Samsung Galaxy Nexus (Android 4.0.3)Asus Nexus 7 (Android 4.1.2)This App uses Google Analytics to collect anonymous usage data and we reserve the right to use this anonymous data for non-commercial purposes.We are one of the best Soundboard Makers on the Play Store, you will not be disappointed, our Soundboards are awesome!Soundboards contain sound bites and music from different games, series and movies usable as ringtones and much more.Having problems?Visit us at http://gnejs.org/ or send an email to Gnejs Development(gnejs.development@gmail.com) and try to describe the problem as good as possible.Some of the current selection of Soundboard Packs:Based on Movies/Series: Aliens, Archer, Ari Gold, Blade, Expendables, Lord of the Rings, Step Brothers.Based on Games: Skyrim, Diablo 3, Modern Warfare 3, Battlefield 3, Borderlands, Borderlands 2, Starcraft, Starcraft 2, Unreal Tournament.Others: Charlie the Unicorn, Llamas with Hats, Gangnam Style, Day[9].Unlike Sound/Ringtone Apps like Zedge and Instant Buttons this App creates a more dedicated sound experience for a movie/game or other suitable candidate for a Soundboard. If you are a Zedge or Instant Buttons user that craves something with more depth, this is the Soundboard App for you!Gnejs Development hopes that you enjoy this release.Best of wishes!

reviews.title: Excellent quality
reviews.comment: This app brings back nostalgic media moments by offering great sound quality through famous movie/film quotes and sounds.
reviews.author: Desmond Miles

reviews.title: Galaxy S3 no prob! !
reviews.comment: This is the most user friendly and great variety of choice from top quality movies and games. Best soundboard on android.!!
reviews.author: Natalie Wilton

reviews.title: Sweeeet!
reviews.comment: Awesome job devs, looking forward to more sb\'s. keep up the God work. Casio commando
reviews.author: Robert Delbovo

reviews.title: Decent soundboard
reviews.comment: This sound board is decent, but the having to install other apps to do thing does get kinda annoying.
reviews.author: Jonathan Kelley

reviews.title: Awesome and realistic
reviews.comment: This app is awesome.... Just got it today and the quality is fantastic and the quotes are bada$$! Trust me... This app is awesome... :3
reviews.author: Fermin Espino

reviews.comment: Awesome I have been wanting these zoundz for my ringtones for the longest time kudos to the Creator(s)
reviews.author: Christopher Scheimer

reviews.title: Sucks!.
reviews.comment: This sucks! The Search Doesn\'t work!! (Shut up sounds.) And the Tutorial Video sound is low!.   Uninstalled!!.
reviews.author: Crystal S

reviews.title: Meh
reviews.comment: I honestly expected there to be no limits or gags with a\"master\" sound board. The should be no token system to put a cap on your sound board and the individual sound boards shouldn\'t require a master soundboard for it to function properly. Other than that, it\'s decent at best.
reviews.author: liam dorsey

reviews.title: Almost
reviews.comment: A good app overall, but needs a lot more content and more soundboard slots
reviews.author: Mihai Fulgescu

reviews.title: Pretty good
reviews.comment: It\'s a good app but I find that it would be better if it let you uninstall a soundboard to get a different one. But I like it.
reviews.author: Dayna Verhey

reviews.title: 5 stars
reviews.comment: I really like this app simple and easy to use.
reviews.author: Brodie Roberts

reviews.title: Awsome!
reviews.comment: This app is pretty cool and I like how they added in a shop
reviews.author: Rosie King

reviews.title: Pay to use
reviews.comment: Gets pesky with ads. Only reviewing now to shut it up. Also annoying coin system hinders functionality. Works well if you play by their rules
reviews.author: Tim Botting

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Nice packs available. Sounds are good quality too.
reviews.author: Laine Wrae Thornton

reviews.title: Best soundboard ever
reviews.comment: Better than instant sounds
reviews.author: Bryan Muela

reviews.title: Tokens?!?
reviews.comment: I\'m sure the app was fine but sound boards were a separate app and required tokens.

reviews.title: Really sweet app
reviews.comment: I was worried it was going to have a fine print, but was wrong it\'s nice and makes it clear you need tokens (no real cash) to get bonuses like losing adds and such.
reviews.author: Richard Stonebraker

reviews.title: EXCELLENT!!
reviews.comment: Nuff said
reviews.author: Josh DuPont

reviews.title: Nice soundboard collection
reviews.comment: Good selection of high quality soundboards, only brought down by the \"free tokens\" system. I\'m not saying using that method is evil or anything, just that I don\'t like arbitrary limits. Neat compilation of amusing packs.
reviews.author: Slezak2007

reviews.title: Fake
reviews.comment: Did not get tokens after install and open sponcered programs
